activities.commit_message:
Initial commit: GitSee - Git Activity Monitoring Tool

Features:
- Auto-scan and manage Git repositories
- Monitor commit and push activities via Git hooks
- Web dashboard with statistics and visualization
- Dual storage: SQLite + JSON
- Repository management interface
- Automatic browser opening on startup

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Python 3.7+ + Flask
- Frontend: HTML + CSS + JavaScript + Chart.js
- Database: SQLite
